description:

my version: 2012.1-dev (2012.1-LOCALBRANCH:LOCALREVISION)

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mwjpiero

comments.content: You need to update your paste config. With the removal of OSAPI v1.0, the APIRouterV11 object was renamed to APIRouter. Please see https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/etc/nova/api-paste.ini for an example
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
